answers.answer: If your doctor said go to the hospital then listen to him / her.
Blood pressure seems fine. But I would still go just to be safe. Good luck!
Yea listen to the Dr your blood pressure sounds like it's normal tho buf your pulse is a lil high so I would go to get checked just to be sure
Go and get checked out...I had preeclampsia with my daughter.

question: So I called a triage nurse because I am on watch for preeclampsia and today I have been very swollen and the doctor told me to come into the hospital so I can get my pressures checked but I have a blood pressure monitor at home and my blood pressure was 114/71 and my pulse was 100. So should I go to the hospital?
title: should i go to the hospital? ftm.
